!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.core 4 4 May 17, 2004 11:01:39.956
!MESSAGE Errors have occured while calculating the synchronization state for 
CVS Workspace.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 -6 May 17, 2004 11:01:39.956
!MESSAGE CVS synchronization information could not be found for 
folder '/org.eclipse.team.core/bin/org/eclipse/team/core'

We've seen this before. We think it is due to the tree viewer holding on to an 
item after it has been disposed but have not been able to reproducde. We 
precheck that the viewer has not been disposed before calling update so we 
know that the viewer is not disposed. Moving to UI.

Then you are doing the right thing... we don't add isDisposed checks to our 
API as that would degrade performance unneccesarily.
